Change TV channel
I go in the living room. Then I find the remote, sit on the couch and turn on the television. Then I use the remote the change the TV channel.


[WALK] <home_office> (1.319)
[WALK] <remote_control> (1.1000)
[FIND] <remote_control> (1.1000)
[FIND] <couch> (1.352)
[SIT] <couch> (1.352)
[FIND] <television> (1.410)
[SWITCHON] <television> (1.410)
